item.title: Bootstrap Typeahead submit on select
item.description: The Twitter Bootstraps Typeahead is a very nice way to provide autocomplete functionality on your text inputs. However, the default configuration might be a bit confusing. When the user clicks on a suggestion in the dropdown menu, the utility populates the input but doesn’t submit the form. It’s usually ok, but sometimes (e.g: search boxes) it’s frustrating.
